actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5. The next meeting is scheduled for 9:30 a.m. on November 8, 2024.

The Chair recongized Mr. Good (VA) for a unanimous consent request. Mr. Good (VA) asked unanimous consent that H.R. 82 be laid on the table. Without objection the unanimous consent request was agreed to.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
The Chair designated Mr. Good of VA to lead the Members in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Andy Harris to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
